full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 759 Filed 08/10/22 Page 202 of 267 LCACmax7 A. Farmer - redirect 1 (Jury not present) 2 THE COURT: I encourage counsel to confer. I'll come back in 10. You let me know if there is dispute about the scope of the -- 5 MS. STERNHEIM: Yes, Judge. May I sit here rather than move or would you prefer I move to that -- 7 THE COURT: I don't mind. That's fine, Ms. Sternheim. 8 MS. STERNHEIM: Thank you. 9 THE COURT: 10 minutes. Thank you. 10 (Recess) 11 THE COURT: Any matters to take up? 12 MS. POMERANTZ: Not from the government, your Honor. 13 MS. MENNINGER: No, your Honor. 14 MS. POMERANTZ: Your Honor, should we get the witness? 15 THE COURT: Yes, he can come in. That's fine. He's been called. 17 Mr. Mulligan, you're welcome to come in, take your mask off. Once the jury comes in, I'll swear you in. 19 THE WITNESS: Okay. 20 (Continued on next page) 21 22 23 24 25 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00016418
